titleStmt.title: Bacchinalia coelestia: a poem, in praise of punch: compos'd by the gods and goddesses in Cabal.
titleStmt.author: Radcliffe, Alexander, fl. 1669-1696.

notesStmt.note: Written by Alexander Radcliffe. Cf. BM.
Verse: "The Gods and the Goddesses lately did Feast ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
